name: rebounder
content:
rebounder noun [C]
(SMALL TRAMPOLINE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(US also mini trampoline, fitness trampoline) a piece of exercise equipment like a small trampoline (= a frame with strong material stretched across it, for jumping up and down on): You can lose fat and tone muscles doing twists and jumping jacks on a rebounder.
Aneduard/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesRebounders are much smaller than regular trampolines, and they are not designed for stunts. Try to stay central on the rebounder and keep your abdominal muscles pulled in.Interval training on a rebounder does not jar the body as much as training on hard ground.We would recommend you go barefoot on the rebounder or wear non-slip socks.

rebounder noun [C]
(BASKETBALL PLAYER)
a basketball player who often gets the ball after shots (= attempts to score points) have been missed: He was fierce on defence and an excellent rebounder. He was the Hoosiers' leading scorer and rebounder each season.
More examplesFewer examplesFord stands 6' 3" tall and is a ferocious rebounder.Malone became the greatest offensive rebounder of all time during a 21-year career.He played basketball, becoming an outstanding rebounder on the court despite being less than 6 feet tall.
